    public class DOIUsersUpdate
extends Object

    Updates the database from the authentication system.

      • updateDoiServerDataBaseFromAuthSystem

        private void updateDoiServerDataBaseFromAuthSystem()
                                            throws AuthenticationAccessException,
                                                   DOIDbException
        Fills the DOI users database from the members of the authentication system.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationAccessException - When an authentication problem occurs
        DOIDbException - When a SQL problem occurs

      • isContained

        private boolean isContained(AuthSystemUser authMember,
                            List<DOIUser> dbusers)
        Tests if the authMember of the authentication mechanism is contained in the users from the database.
        Parameters:
        authMember - authMember of the authentication mechanism
        dbusers - users database
        Returns:
        True when the authMember is contained in the users from database otherwise false

      • isContained

        private boolean isContained(DOIUser dbuser,
                            List<AuthSystemUser> authMembers)
        Tests if a user from the database is contained in the members from the authentication system.
        Parameters:
        dbuser - the user from the database
        authMembers - the users from the authentication system
        Returns:
        True when the user from the database is contained from the users from the authentication system
